document: The Agency Cost of Financial Decision Making: An Empirical Analysis by Claire Elaine Crutchley Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy in Finance APPROVED: Robert S.
